Property.Name: REQUEST_NO
Property.sap:label: Request Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Internal request identifier for the Service Entry Sheet

Property.Name: SERVICE_PERIOD
Property.sap:label: Service Period
Property.sap:quickinfo: Period during which the service was provided

Property.Name: PO_NUMBER
Property.sap:label: Purchase Order Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Unique identifier of the Purchase Order linked to this SES

Property.Name: SES_STATUS
Property.sap:label: SES Status
Property.sap:quickinfo: Current processing status of the Service Entry Sheet

Property.Name: VENDOR_STATUS
Property.sap:label: Vendor Status
Property.sap:quickinfo: Status set by the vendor when submitting the SES

Property.Name: AMOUNT
Property.sap:quickinfo: Total value of the Service Entry Sheet

Property.Name: SERVICE_LOCATION
Property.sap:label: Service Location
Property.sap:quickinfo: Location where the service was performed

Property.Name: PERSON_RESPONSIBLE
Property.sap:label: Person Responsible
Property.sap:quickinfo: Individual responsible for the service execution

Property.Name: CURRENT_ASSIGNEE
Property.sap:label: Current Assignee
Property.sap:quickinfo: User currently assigned to process the SES

Property.Name: COMPANY_CODE
Property.sap:label: Company Code
Property.sap:quickinfo: Company code responsible for this SES

Property.Name: APPROVER_ROLE
Property.sap:label: Approver Role
Property.sap:quickinfo: Role responsible for approving the SES

Property.Name: REQUESTER_ID
Property.sap:label: Requester ID
Property.sap:quickinfo: Identifier of the user who requested the service

Property.Name: APPROVER_LEVEL
Property.sap:label: Approver Level
Property.sap:quickinfo: Numeric level of the approver in the approval workflow

Property.Name: LAST_UPDATED_ON
Property.sap:label: Last Updated On
Property.sap:quickinfo: Date and time when the SES was last updated

Property.Name: CREATED_ON
Property.sap:label: Created On
Property.sap:quickinfo: Date and time when the SES was created

Property.Name: PROCESS_LEVEL
Property.sap:label: Process Level
Property.sap:quickinfo: Current workflow stage of the SES process

Property.Name: SUPPLIER_NUMBER
Property.sap:label: Supplier Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Unique identifier of the supplier/vendor (LIFNR)

Property.Name: SUPPLIER_NAME
Property.sap:label: Supplier Name
Property.sap:quickinfo: Full name of the supplier providing the service

Property.Name: FINAL_SES_ENTRY
Property.sap:label: Final SES Entry
Property.sap:quickinfo: Indicates whether this is the final SES entry

Property.Name: SITE_PERSON
Property.sap:label: Site Person
Property.sap:quickinfo: On-site person responsible for service verification

Property.Name: SERVICE_TEXT
Property.sap:label: Service Text
Property.sap:quickinfo: Detailed description of the services performed

Property.Name: COMMENT
Property.sap:quickinfo: Remarks or notes related to the SES

Property.Name: ServicePOType
Property.sap:label: Service PO Type
Property.sap:quickinfo: Type/category of the purchase order for services

Property.Name: REJECTION_COMMENT
Property.sap:label: Rejection Comment
Property.sap:quickinfo: Reason provided when the SES is rejected

Property.Name: TYPE
Property.sap:quickinfo: Classification type of the SES

Property.Name: SAP_REFERENCE_NUMBER
Property.sap:label: SAP Reference Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Reference number returned from SAP for this SES

Property.Name: total_service_sheet_value
Property.sap:label: Total Service Sheet Value
Property.sap:quickinfo: Cumulative value of all service line items in the SES

NavigationProperty.Name: to_Items
NavigationProperty.sap:label: Service Entry Sheet Items
NavigationProperty.sap:quickinfo: Association to all SES item records linked to this request

NavigationProperty.Name: to_Attachments
NavigationProperty.sap:label: Service Entry Sheet Attachments
NavigationProperty.sap:quickinfo: Association to all SES attachments linked to this request

Property.Name: REQUEST_NO
Property.sap:label: Request Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Internal request identifier for the Service Entry Sheet item

Property.Name: SR_NO
Property.sap:label: Service Item Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Sequential number of the service item within the SES

Property.Name: SERVICE_NUMBER
Property.sap:label: Service Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Unique identifier of the service from the service master

Property.Name: SERVICE_DESCRIPTION
Property.sap:label: Service Description
Property.sap:quickinfo: Detailed description of the service provided

Property.Name: ORDERED_QUANTITY
Property.sap:label: Ordered Quantity
Property.sap:quickinfo: Quantity of service ordered in the purchase order

Property.Name: UNIT_OF_MEASURE
Property.sap:label: Unit of Measure
Property.sap:quickinfo: Measurement unit for the service quantity (e.g., HRS, EA)

Property.Name: UNIT_PRICE
Property.sap:label: Unit Price
Property.sap:quickinfo: Price per unit of the service

Property.Name: SERVICE_QUANTITY
Property.sap:label: Service Quantity
Property.sap:quickinfo: Quantity of the service actually performed

Property.Name: TOTAL_PRICE
Property.sap:label: Total Price
Property.sap:quickinfo: Total calculated price for the service line item

Property.Name: ITEM_NUMBER
Property.sap:label: Item Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Item number from the purchase order related to the service

Property.Name: STATUS
Property.sap:quickinfo: Processing status of the SES item (e.g., Open, Approved)

Property.Name: packno
Property.sap:label: Package Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Package number grouping service items in the SES

Property.Name: introw
Property.sap:label: Internal Row
Property.sap:quickinfo: Internal row identifier used for technical grouping

Property.Name: packageNofromPO
Property.sap:label: Package Number from PO
Property.sap:quickinfo: Package number reference from the purchase order

Property.Name: REQUEST_NO
Property.sap:label: Request Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Internal request identifier linked to the Service Entry Sheet

Property.Name: DESCRIPTION
Property.sap:quickinfo: Brief description of the attachment content

Property.Name: base64value
Property.sap:label: File Content (Base64)
Property.sap:quickinfo: Attachment content stored as base64-encoded binary data

Property.Name: COMMENT
Property.sap:quickinfo: Additional remarks or notes related to the attachment

Property.Name: TYPE
Property.sap:label: File Type
Property.sap:quickinfo: Type or format of the attachment file (e.g., PDF, JPG, DOCX)

Property.Name: URL
Property.sap:quickinfo: External or internal URL location of the attachment

Property.Name: REQUEST_NO
Property.sap:label: Request Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Internal request identifier for the Service Entry Sheet log entry

Property.Name: PO_NUMBER
Property.sap:label: Purchase Order Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Unique identifier of the Purchase Order linked to this SES log

Property.Name: APPROVAL_LEVEL
Property.sap:label: Approval Level
Property.sap:quickinfo: Numeric level of the approval step in the workflow

Property.Name: APPROVER_ID
Property.sap:label: Approver ID
Property.sap:quickinfo: Unique identifier of the approver (e.g., user ID or employee ID)

Property.Name: APPROVER_ROLE
Property.sap:label: Approver Role
Property.sap:quickinfo: Role of the approver in the SES approval process

Property.Name: ACTION
Property.sap:quickinfo: Action taken by the approver (e.g., Approved, Rejected, Forwarded)

Property.Name: COMMENT
Property.sap:quickinfo: Remarks or notes provided by the approver

Property.Name: TIMESTAMP
Property.sap:quickinfo: Date when the action or update was recorded

Property.Name: SES_STATUS
Property.sap:label: SES Status
Property.sap:quickinfo: Current processing status of the Service Entry Sheet at this log entry

Property.Name: AMOUNT
Property.sap:quickinfo: Total value of the Service Entry Sheet at this log stage

Property.Name: CREATED_ON
Property.sap:label: Created On
Property.sap:quickinfo: Date when this log entry was created
